SymbolDef.descr: SimProp mission property, type and set definitions.

PropertyDef.name: ShowOnlyDuringPlayback
PropertyDef.descr: A boolean determining whether this object will be shown only when a recording is being played back.

PropertyDef.name: MetarData
PropertyDef.descr: A string in the Meteorological Aerodrome Report (METAR) format which is used for reporting weather information. METAR weather reports are the standard way of weather reporting used by pilots. Please see associated SimConnect Metar Data Format documentation for help with the format.

PropertyDef.name: OverwriteStationID
PropertyDef.descr: A boolean determining whether or not the weather station ID, referenced in the MetarData, is removed before applying the MetarData. If set to FALSE, and the global station ID is being used, the weather will only change when the user moves a weather stations that have not been set. In the case where the global station ID is being used, the global weather will immediately update.

PropertyDef.name: StationID
PropertyDef.descr: A string representing a three or four character station ID in the following format: CCCC. For example, KORD represents the O'Hare airport in Chicago. An empty string can be used to represent all weather stations.

PropertyDef.name: HasKeyboardInteractivity
PropertyDef.descr: Set to true if the Scaleform content needs to process keyboard input.

PropertyDef.name: HasMouseInteractivity
PropertyDef.descr: Set to true if the Scaleform content needs to process mouse input.

PropertyDef.name: FlashFileName
PropertyDef.descr: The flash file to be used by the Scaleform content.

PropertyDef.name: SoundFileName
PropertyDef.descr: The wave file to be rendered by the audio system. The file should be in a valid sound content directory or relative to the resource path of the scenario.

PropertyDef.name: Length
PropertyDef.descr: Default units are in meters.

PropertyDef.name: Width
PropertyDef.descr: Default units are in meters.

PropertyDef.name: Height
PropertyDef.descr: Default units are in meters.

PropertyDef.name: NumberOfSeconds
PropertyDef.descr: Number of seconds to show the text.

PropertyDef.name: NewObjectState
PropertyDef.descr: True: Change trigger to be activated. False: Change the trigger to be non-activated.

PropertyDef.name: OnCompleteDelay
PropertyDef.descr: The amount of delay, in seconds, before firing the OnCompleteActions.

PropertyDef.name: CurrentTime
PropertyDef.descr: Current time of the timer trigger.

PropertyDef.name: StartTime
PropertyDef.descr: Number of seconds to start counting.

PropertyDef.name: StopTime
PropertyDef.descr: Number of seconds in stop counting.

PropertyDef.name: OneShot
PropertyDef.descr: Set to True if the trigger should only fire once during the mission. Note a few triggers do not contain this property, these are noted in the descriptions for those triggers.

PropertyDef.name: IsGlobal
PropertyDef.descr: Set to True to specify the actions of the trigger firing apply to all players, False to specify they only apply to the triggering player.

PropertyDef.name: OnScreenTimer
PropertyDef.descr: True: Use this trigger as the onscreen timer.

PropertyDef.name: StaysVisible
PropertyDef.descr: If true, timer will stay on screen after deactivation.

PropertyDef.name: DeltaTime
PropertyDef.descr: Floating point time penalty in seconds.

PropertyDef.name: CameraOrigin
PropertyDef.descr: Select where the origin of the camera will be placed. Cameras whose origin specifies that they are world objects, will use the referenced location and orientation. Cameras whose origin specify virtual cockpit will show the interior model of the user vehicle instead of the exterior.

PropertyDef.name: ObjectFilter
PropertyDef.descr: This can be one of: User, Reference or Anything. The default is set to Reference, which means only the objects listed for OnEnterFilter and OnExitFilter can fire the trigger. If it is set to User, then only the user aircraft can fire the trigger. If it is set to Anything then any aircraft can fire the trigger. If it is set to User or Anything then OnEnterFilter and OnExitFilter are ignored.

PropertyDef.name: SoundType
PropertyDef.descr: The type of sound for the DialogAction to play. Can be None, Text to Speech to read aloud the Text, or Sound File to play the SoundFileName referenced above.

PropertyDef.name: ShowText
PropertyDef.descr: Shows dialog text on screen as it is being read.

PropertyDef.name: RandomizeInList
PropertyDef.descr: True: Randomize the playlist item in the list. False: Play at its current position in the list.

PropertyDef.name: PreserveInstanceId
PropertyDef.descr: True: Preserve the instance id of spawned objects. False: Don't spawn objects already existing objects.

PropertyDef.name: AirportIdent
PropertyDef.descr: The airport identification code, such as KORF for Norfolk International.

PropertyDef.name: LandingType
PropertyDef.descr: One of: FullStop, TouchDown or Any. The default is FullStop.

PropertyDef.name: RunwayNumber
PropertyDef.descr: Runway Number.

PropertyDef.name: RunwayDesignator
PropertyDef.descr: Runway Designator.

PropertyDef.name: Latched
PropertyDef.descr: True after a trigger has fired, false otherwise.

PropertyDef.name: IsExecutingRepeatActions
PropertyDef.descr: Internal use only. Do not modify.

PropertyDef.name: RepeatActionsAreGlobal
PropertyDef.descr: Internal use only. Do not modify.

PropertyDef.name: RepeatActionsIDActivator
PropertyDef.descr: Internal use only. Do not modify.

PropertyDef.name: ExcludeScheduledBoats
PropertyDef.descr: Exclude Living World Scheduled Boats.

PropertyDef.name: ExcludeRandomBoats
PropertyDef.descr: Exclude Living World Random Boats.

PropertyDef.name: ExcludeFreewayTraffic
PropertyDef.descr: Exclude Living World Freeway Traffic.

PropertyDef.name: ExcludeAircraft
PropertyDef.descr: Exclude Living World AI Aircraft.

PropertyDef.name: ExcludeAirportVehicles
PropertyDef.descr: Exclude Living World airport ground vehicles.

PropertyDef.name: Name
PropertyDef.descr: Object name.

PropertyDef.name: Units
PropertyDef.descr: Simulation variable units.

PropertyDef.name: CustomUnits
PropertyDef.descr: Custom Units.

PropertyDef.name: Index
PropertyDef.descr: Simulation variable index.

PropertyDef.name: Number
PropertyDef.descr: Constant numeric value.

PropertyDef.name: Boolean
PropertyDef.descr: Constant boolean value.

PropertyDef.name: PauseFlight
PropertyDef.descr: Pauses the flight. Unpause is not possible to be triggered so false here will do nothing.

PropertyDef.name: PositionFreezeSelf
PropertyDef.descr: Freezes the position of the user.

PropertyDef.name: PositionFreezeAll
PropertyDef.descr: Freezes the position of all objects.

PropertyDef.name: TargetPlayer
PropertyDef.descr: The players who should receive the action in multiplayer mode. One of: Local Player, All Players, Triggering Player, All but Triggering Player. If an action does not contain this property, the action will affect only the local player, with the exception of Race Clock Start Action and Race Course Activate Action, which affect all players.

PropertyDef.name: VoiceSelection
PropertyDef.descr: Chosen Text To Speech Voice from the Windows Control Panel text to speech listing.

PropertyDef.name: System
PropertyDef.descr: System name to be referenced.

PropertyDef.name: SystemEnum
PropertyDef.descr: System enum to be referenced.

PropertyDef.name: MultiChoicePopupActionQuestion
PropertyDef.descr: Multi-choice question text.

PropertyDef.name: MultiChoicePopupActionAnswers
PropertyDef.descr: List of possible answers to the question.

PropertyDef.name: CameraView
PropertyDef.descr: GUID of the camera affected by view change action.

PropertyDef.name: FocalPointPreviewCamera
PropertyDef.descr: Camera that will be used to preview the focal point. This camera has no bearing on the focal point itself and will not be used.

PropertyDef.name: EnableUserInput
PropertyDef.descr: If True, Keyboard, Mouse, and Joysticks are enabled. If False, Keyboard, Mouse, and Joysticks are disabled.

PropertyDef.name: FocalPointTopLeftXYZ
PropertyDef.descr: 3D XYZ coordinates of Focal Point top left.

PropertyDef.name: FocalPointTopRightXYZ
PropertyDef.descr: 3D XYZ coordinates of Focal Point top right.

PropertyDef.name: FocalPointBottomLeftXYZ
PropertyDef.descr: 3D XYZ coordinates of Focal Point bottom left.

PropertyDef.name: FocalPointBottomRightXYZ
PropertyDef.descr: 3D XYZ coordinates of Focal Point bottom right.

PropertyDef.name: FocalPointTopLeftPanelX
PropertyDef.descr: X Window coordinate of Focal Point top left for 2D panel.

PropertyDef.name: FocalPointTopLeftPanelY
PropertyDef.descr: Y Window coordinates of Focal Point top left for 2D panel.

PropertyDef.name: FocalPointBottomRightPanelX
PropertyDef.descr: X Window coordinates of Focal Point bottom right for 2D panel.

PropertyDef.name: FocalPointBottomRightPanelY
PropertyDef.descr: Y Window coordinates of Focal Point bottom right for 2D panel.

PropertyDef.name: FocalPointPanelWindowID
PropertyDef.descr: ID of 2D panel to draw focal point onto.

PropertyDef.name: FocalPointName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of Focal Point.

PropertyDef.name: GroupColor
PropertyDef.descr: A color that can be used to easily identify a group.

PropertyDef.name: PixelThickness
PropertyDef.descr: The pixel thickness of the Focal Point.

PropertyDef.name: DisplayTextOnTop
PropertyDef.descr: Whether the focal point text should be displayed on top of the focal point. If false, it will be displayed on the bottom of the focal point.

PropertyDef.name: WindowName
PropertyDef.descr: The name of the gauge window to send the mouse event to.

PropertyDef.name: UCoordinate
PropertyDef.descr: The U coordinate of the gauge window to send the mouse event.

PropertyDef.name: VCoordinate
PropertyDef.descr: The V coordinate of the gauge window to send the mouse event.

PropertyDef.name: MouseEventType
PropertyDef.descr: The Mouse Event type, either up or down.

PropertyDef.name: EventName
PropertyDef.descr: The name of the event to simulate.

PropertyDef.name: EventData
PropertyDef.descr: The data associated with the simulated event.

PropertyDef.name: EventIndex
PropertyDef.descr: The index associated with the simulated event.

PropertyDef.name: SelectedBehavior
PropertyDef.descr: The behavior from the chosen entity that will become activated or deactivated.

PropertyDef.name: BehaviorActivated
PropertyDef.descr: Whether to activate or deactivate the selected behavior.

PropertyDef.name: SystemIndex
PropertyDef.descr: If an aircraft has multiple systems (usually applies to engines or instruments), enter the index of the system that the failure should apply to.

PropertyDef.name: HealthPercent
PropertyDef.descr: Enter a value of between 0 (complete failure) and 100 (fully functional). For System entries such as OilLeak or FuelLeak the lower the HealthPercent the greater the leak. For control surfaces such as LeftWingTip the HealthPercent determines the lift. For instruments and radios no partial or intermittent behavior is implemented, so set the HealthPercent to 0 for not operational, or 100 for fully operational.

PropertyDef.name: Behavior
PropertyDef.descr: Not implemented, use the HealthPercent property.

PropertyDef.name: StationIndex
PropertyDef.descr: Payload station index.

PropertyDef.name: AdjustmentType
PropertyDef.descr: Specifies how the payload on a station is to be adjusted.

PropertyDef.name: Weight
PropertyDef.descr: Weight to set or add to/subtract from station.

PropertyDef.name: ObjectType
PropertyDef.descr: The identifying title of the new object, from an aircraft configuration file.

PropertyDef.name: StartCount
PropertyDef.descr: Initial value for counter.

PropertyDef.name: StopCount
PropertyDef.descr: Trigger value for counter.

PropertyDef.name: Counter
PropertyDef.descr: Current value for counter.

PropertyDef.name: Count
PropertyDef.descr: Value to be added to the Counter triggers current counter. The default is 1.

PropertyDef.name: CurrentSelection
PropertyDef.descr: Object is the current selection.

PropertyDef.name: CycleOrder
PropertyDef.descr: The order in which this Point of Interest should be selected. The lower order POIs are selected first.

PropertyDef.name: TargetName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the target.

PropertyDef.name: OffsetXYZ
PropertyDef.descr: Offset in 3D space.

PropertyDef.name: DelaySeconds
PropertyDef.descr: Number of seconds to delay.

PropertyDef.name: FadeOutTime
PropertyDef.descr: Time till the object fades out, if FadeOutStartDistance is set it will start to fade after FadeOutStartDistance is reached. Only the RibbonPath alpha fades out over time. Only applies to dynamic paths.

PropertyDef.name: FadeOutStartDistance
PropertyDef.descr: Length till the object starts to fade out, if FadeOutTime is set it will be applied after FadeOutStartDistance is reached. Only applies to dynamic paths.

PropertyDef.name: TimeElapsed
PropertyDef.descr: Current amount of time that has elapsed. Do not set this.

PropertyDef.name: GoalState
PropertyDef.descr: Current state of a goal.

PropertyDef.name: GoalResolution
PropertyDef.descr: Resolution of a goal. Set to completed or failed. NOTE: Completed goals can still be failed unless failure triggers are deactivated.

PropertyDef.name: ObjectiveStatus
PropertyDef.descr: Current state of a Mission Objective. DETERMINED DURING MISSION RUNTIME.

PropertyDef.name: ObjectivePassed
PropertyDef.descr: True if the Mission Objective's current score is above the passing score, false otherwise. DETERMINED DURING MISSION RUNTIME.

PropertyDef.name: ObjectivePassingScore
PropertyDef.descr: Total points necessary for this objective to succeed.

PropertyDef.name: ObjectiveCurrentScore
PropertyDef.descr: Current score for this objective. DETERMINED DURING MISSION RUNTIME.

PropertyDef.name: ObjectivePossibleScore
PropertyDef.descr: Total points possible for this objective. DETERMINED DURING MISSION RUNTIME.

PropertyDef.name: ObjectivePointValue
PropertyDef.descr: Points that this objective is worth if successful.

PropertyDef.name: GroupGoalPassed
PropertyDef.descr: True if the Group Goal's current score is above the passing score, false otherwise. DETERMINED DURING MISSION RUNTIME.

PropertyDef.name: GroupGoalPassingScore
PropertyDef.descr: Total points necessary for this Group Goal to succeed.

PropertyDef.name: GroupGoalCurrentScore
PropertyDef.descr: Current score for this Group Goal. DETERMINED DURING MISSION RUNTIME.

PropertyDef.name: GroupGoalPossibleScore
PropertyDef.descr: Total points possible for this Group Goal. DETERMINED DURING MISSION RUNTIME.

PropertyDef.name: FailedGoalText
PropertyDef.descr: Text which can be obtained via SimConnect that is associated with the goal being failed.

PropertyDef.name: SucceededGoalText
PropertyDef.descr: Text which can be obtained via SimConnect that is associated with the goal being passed.

PropertyDef.name: NewGoalText
PropertyDef.descr: Text that will be applied to resolved goal. If goal is passed, this will overwrite the SucceededGoalText. If goal is failed, this will overwrite the FailedGoalText.

PropertyDef.name: UpdateGoalText
PropertyDef.descr: Whether the resolved goal should have its Succeeded or Failed text updated to NewGoalText.

PropertyDef.name: OnScreenTextColor
PropertyDef.descr: The RGB color value of the text.

PropertyDef.name: OnScreenTextDisplayLocation
PropertyDef.descr: The location of the screen that the text will appear at.

PropertyDef.name: OnScreenTextBackgroundColor
PropertyDef.descr: The backdrop color of the box rendered behind the on-screen text.

PropertyDef.name: OnScreenTextFontSize
PropertyDef.descr: The font size of the on-screen text.

PropertyDef.name: FocalPointRenderMode
PropertyDef.descr: Mode designating how the focal point should render.

PropertyDef.name: FocalPointRenderCondition
PropertyDef.descr: Mode designating what conditions the focal point should render in.

PropertyDef.name: ViewRenderCondition
PropertyDef.descr: Mode designating what view the object should render into.

PropertyDef.name: Order
PropertyDef.descr: Order of appearance in the UI.

PropertyDef.name: FlyingTips
PropertyDef.descr: Flying tips setting override. One of: User Specified, Enable, or Disable.

PropertyDef.name: CrashBehavior
PropertyDef.descr: Crash behavior setting override. One of: User Specified, AutoRecover, ResetFlight or EndFlight.

PropertyDef.name: UnlimitedFuel
PropertyDef.descr: Unlimited fuel setting override. One of: UserSpecified, Limited, or Unlimited.

PropertyDef.name: AircraftLabels
PropertyDef.descr: Aircraft label setting override. One of: UserSpecified, Enabled, or Disabled.

PropertyDef.name: AvatarNoCollision
PropertyDef.descr: Avatar no collision setting override. One of: UserSpecified, Enabled, or Disabled.

PropertyDef.name: FlightRealism
PropertyDef.descr: Limits access to some features that affect flight realism. One of: UserSpecified, Enforced, or Relaxed.

PropertyDef.name: WorldRealism
PropertyDef.descr: Limits access to some features that affect world realism. One of: UserSpecified, Enforced, or Relaxed.

PropertyDef.name: ATCMenuDisabled
PropertyDef.descr: Set to True to disable the ATC menu.

PropertyDef.name: MaxAutogen
PropertyDef.descr: Max Autogen setting for this mission.

PropertyDef.name: MinAutogen
PropertyDef.descr: Min Autogen setting for this mission.

PropertyDef.name: MaxScenery
PropertyDef.descr: Max Scenery Complexity setting for this mission.

PropertyDef.name: MinScenery
PropertyDef.descr: Min Scenery Complexity setting for this mission.

PropertyDef.name: MaxWater
PropertyDef.descr: Max Water setting for this mission. Value from 0 to 7.

PropertyDef.name: MinWater
PropertyDef.descr: Min Water setting for this mission. Value from 0 to 7.

PropertyDef.name: PayloadName
PropertyDef.descr: The name of the container that becomes the object to be dropped.

PropertyDef.name: PayloadCount
PropertyDef.descr: The number of payload objects that should be attached.

PropertyDef.name: SelectedModelGuid
PropertyDef.descr: GUID of the model when the point of interest is selected.

PropertyDef.name: UnselectedModelGuid
PropertyDef.descr: GUID of the model when the point of interest is unselected.

PropertyDef.name: PropertySource
PropertyDef.descr: Selects the object to provide a property value in the context of an expression evaluation.

PropertyDef.name: UseTargetPosition
PropertyDef.descr: Set to True or False. True indicates that the camera will try to keep the AttachedWorldObject, if one is set, in view.

PropertyDef.name: AnimationGUID
PropertyDef.descr: GUID of the animation. Refer to the section on Creating a New Animation in the Using Modeling Tools document, which describes animation GUIDs.

PropertyDef.name: LoopAnimation
PropertyDef.descr: Set to True to loop the animation.

PropertyDef.name: MinimumModelScale
PropertyDef.descr: The scale factor to be applied when the object is MinimumScaleDistance away from the view camera.

PropertyDef.name: MaximumModelScale
PropertyDef.descr: Scale factor to be applied when the object is MaximumScaleDistance away from the view camera.

PropertyDef.name: MinimumScaleDistance
PropertyDef.descr: If the object is closer than the MinimumScaleDistance to the view camera, it will be scaled by MinimumModelScale.

PropertyDef.name: MaximumScaleDistance
PropertyDef.descr: The distance beyond which the object is scales by MaximumModelScale.

PropertyDef.name: ViewCloseDelay
PropertyDef.descr: A delay in seconds that will occur before the camera shuts down, in the event that the AttachedWorldObject, if one is set, is removed.

PropertyDef.name: CameraDistance
PropertyDef.descr: The distance in meters the camera is away from the AttachedWorldObject, if one is set.

PropertyDef.name: CameraOffsetY
PropertyDef.descr: The height in meters the camera is away from the AttachedWorldObject, if one is set.

PropertyDef.name: CameraPitch
PropertyDef.descr: The angle in degrees that the camera is facing. A negative value indicating a downward view.

PropertyDef.name: SinkTransitionSize
PropertyDef.descr: The width in meters of the transition layer between the Sink and the atmosphere outside of the thermal. Half of the width of this transition will be outside the radius of the Sink layer, and half within.

PropertyDef.name: SinkLayerSize
PropertyDef.descr: The width in meters of the Sink layer.

PropertyDef.name: CoreTransitionSize
PropertyDef.descr: The width in meters of the transition layer between the Core and the Sink of the thermal. Half of the width of this transition will be outside the Core, and half within.

PropertyDef.name: CoreSize
PropertyDef.descr: The radius in meters of the Core of the thermal.

PropertyDef.name: BaseHeight
PropertyDef.descr: The size of the transition layer, in meters, at the base of the thermal. The default is 50m. This is not the height of the thermal above the ground.

PropertyDef.name: TopHeight
PropertyDef.descr: The size of the transition layer, in meters, at the top of the thermal. The default is 50m. This is not the height of the thermal.

PropertyDef.name: SinkRate
PropertyDef.descr: The lift value, in meters per second, within the Sink layer. A positive value will provide an updraft, a negative value a downdraft.

PropertyDef.name: SinkTurbulence
PropertyDef.descr: A variation in meters per second that is applied to the SinkRate. For example, if a value of 1.5 is entered, and the SinkRate is -3 m/s, the actual sink rate applied will be randomly varying between -1.5 m/s and -4.5 m/s.

PropertyDef.name: CoreRate
PropertyDef.descr: The lift value, in meters per second, within the Core layer. A positive value will provide an updraft, a negative value a downdraft.

PropertyDef.name: CoreTurbulence
PropertyDef.descr: A variation in meters per second that is applied to the CoreRate. For example, if a value of 1.5 is entered, and the CoreRate is 5 m/s, the actual core rate applied will be randomly varying between 3.5 m/s and 6.5 m/s.

PropertyDef.name: AirObjectModelGuid
PropertyDef.descr: An optional model GUID. The model will be rendered within the thermal box.

PropertyDef.name: ScaleModel
PropertyDef.descr: Set to True to if the model should be scaled to match the size of the thermal box. Set to False to render the model to its own scale.

PropertyDef.name: ProbabilityPercent
PropertyDef.descr: The probability that any action at all will fire. Enter 100 to ensure an action will fire.

PropertyDef.name: CoreRateScalar
PropertyDef.descr: A scalar value that is applied to the wind in the Core area of the ridge lift. A positive value will provide an updraft, a negative value a downdraft. Typically a positive value such as 0.5 would be entered here. So if the wind speed was 8 m/s, an updraft of 4 m/s would be applied.

PropertyDef.name: SinkRateScalar
PropertyDef.descr: A scalar value that is applied to the wind in the Sink area of the ridge lift. A positive value will provide an updraft, a negative value a downdraft. Typically a negative value such as 0.5 would be entered here. So if the wind speed was 8 m/s, an downdraft of 4 m/s would be applied.

PropertyDef.name: Duration
PropertyDef.descr: Duration of the rumble in seconds, or fractions of a second.

PropertyDef.name: Intensity
PropertyDef.descr: Intensity of rumble effect. One of: Off, Low, Med, High.

PropertyDef.name: PayloadString
PropertyDef.descr: Text that will be transmitted to the SimConnect client when the action is initiated. The text can be any string that the client might find useful.

PropertyDef.name: WaitForCompletion
PropertyDef.descr: Set this to Yes if a completion message must be received from the SimConnect client, before the mission progresses. Set to No otherwise.

PropertyDef.name: RadiusMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum radius for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: RadiusMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum radius for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: HeightMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum height for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: HeightMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum height for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: CoreRateMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum core updraft speed for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: CoreRateMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum core updraft speed for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: CoreTurbulenceMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum core turbulence for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: CoreTurbulenceMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum core turbulence for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: SinkRateMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum sink speed for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: SinkRateMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum sink speed for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: SinkTurbulenceMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum sink turbulence for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: SinkTurbulenceMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum sink turbulence for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: CoreSizeMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum relative size of core for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: CoreSizeMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum relative size of core for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: CoreTransitionSizeMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum relative size of core transition zone for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: CoreTransitionSizeMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum relative size of core transition zone for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: SinkSizeMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum relative size of sink zone for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: SinkSizeMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum relative size of sink zone for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: SinkTransitionSizeMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum relative size of sink transition zone for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: SinkTransitionSizeMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum relative size of sink transition zone for autogenerated thermal.

PropertyDef.name: Airspeed
PropertyDef.descr: Current speed in knots. Can be zero.

PropertyDef.name: IsCinematic
PropertyDef.descr: Set to True for a LetterBox image, False for a full-screen image.

PropertyDef.name: Exists
PropertyDef.descr: Does this object exist?

PropertyDef.name: PercentFuel
PropertyDef.descr: Set to a number between 0.0 and 100.0, indicating how much fuel, as a percentage of the capacity of the fuel tanks, should be added to the tanks.

PropertyDef.name: PercentNitrous
PropertyDef.descr: Set to a number between 0.0 and 100.0, indicating how much fuel should be added to the Nitrous tanks.

PropertyDef.name: PercentAntiDetonation
PropertyDef.descr: Set to a number between 0.0 and 100.0, indicating how much fuel should be added to the AntiDetonation tanks.

PropertyDef.name: CameraLLA
PropertyDef.descr: World position of saved camera.

PropertyDef.name: CameraZoomLevel
PropertyDef.descr: Camera zoom level to use.

PropertyDef.name: CameraPBH
PropertyDef.descr: Camera orientation to use.

PropertyDef.name: CameraChaseAltitude
PropertyDef.descr: Altitude above the target in meters. This property applies only to cameras that are tracking objects.

PropertyDef.name: CameraChaseDistance
PropertyDef.descr: Distance to target in meters. This property applies only to cameras that are tracking objects.

PropertyDef.name: NextStep
PropertyDef.descr: Reference to the Mission Flow step that follows the current Mission Flow step.

PropertyDef.name: Script
PropertyDef.descr: A snippet of script

PropertyDef.name: PanelID
PropertyDef.descr: The ID of the panel.

PropertyDef.name: Docked
PropertyDef.descr: Whether the window should open docked

PropertyDef.name: Locked
PropertyDef.descr: Whether the window should open locked

PropertyDef.name: CanClose
PropertyDef.descr: Whether the window can be closed by the user.

PropertyDef.name: UseDefault
PropertyDef.descr: If true, window will open in default location with default size. Otherwise it will use the location/size specified in the object.

PropertyDef.name: LocationX
PropertyDef.descr: Base position the window should open at in X direction from left (in pixels)

PropertyDef.name: LocationY
PropertyDef.descr: Base position the window should open at in Y direction from top (in pixels)

PropertyDef.name: PanelWidth
PropertyDef.descr: Base width the panel window should open with (in pixels)

PropertyDef.name: PanelHeight
PropertyDef.descr: Base height the panel window should open with (in pixels)

PropertyDef.name: WindowWidth
PropertyDef.descr: Base width the window should open with (in pixels)

PropertyDef.name: WindowHeight
PropertyDef.descr: Base height the window should open with (in pixels)

PropertyDef.name: LeftOffsetPercentage
PropertyDef.descr: Percentage of main window (if docked) or chosen monitor (if undocked) to add to the base X position. Between 0 and 1.

PropertyDef.name: TopOffsetPercentage
PropertyDef.descr: Percentage of main window (if docked) or chosen monitor (if undocked) to add to the base Y position. Between 0 and 1.

PropertyDef.name: ExpansionWidthPercentage
PropertyDef.descr: Percentage of main window (if docked) or chosen monitor (if undocked) to add to the base width. Between 0 and 1.

PropertyDef.name: ExpansionHeightPercentage
PropertyDef.descr: Percentage of main window (if docked) or chosen monitor (if undocked) to add to the base height. Between 0 and 1.

PropertyDef.name: RelativeTo
PropertyDef.descr: Sets what the expansion/offset percentages and base position are relative to. Either the main window (if docked) or a monitor index (if undocked). Monitors are ordered by their positions from left to right. If two monitors are at the same left position, then the monitor on top comes first.

PropertyDef.name: WorldSize
PropertyDef.descr: Length and Width of an object in meters.

PropertyDef.name: MinimumScreenSize
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum allowed Length and Width of an object in screen pixels.

PropertyDef.name: MaximumScreenSize
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum allowed Length and Width of an object in screen pixels.

PropertyDef.name: FlashFileResolution
PropertyDef.descr: Resolution that the flash file will be created at. Smaller resolutions will allow the flash content to render more efficiently but at a loss of clarity.

PropertyDef.name: InstanceName
PropertyDef.descr: If this property is set, then the object is instanced with the specific instance name. Otherwise, it is shared at the global level. Objects handle handle the instance name differently.

PropertyDef.name: LightingType
PropertyDef.descr: Determine the lighting for the material.

PropertyDef.name: DisplayType
PropertyDef.descr: Determine how the material should display.

PropertyDef.name: DrawInsideInteriorViews
PropertyDef.descr: Draw inside Interior Views when avaliable.

PropertyDef.name: FlashFileUpdateScheme
PropertyDef.descr: Determine how the flash file should update its movie.

PropertyDef.name: FaceCameraAxes
PropertyDef.descr: Determines whether or not each axis of the specified object will face the camera.

PropertyDef.name: BodyRelativeOffset
PropertyDef.descr: Determines whether or not each rotational axis will be body relative in determining how to apply the specified offset to the attached object.

PropertyDef.name: BodyRelativeRotation
PropertyDef.descr: Determines whether or not each rotational axis on the specified object will be body relative to the attached object's rotation.

PropertyDef.name: InsideDirection
PropertyDef.descr: The opposite side of the pylon than the racer is to pass, one of: Left, Right.

PropertyDef.name: IgnoreDistance
PropertyDef.descr: If the player passes the pylon at this specified distance, or greater, then the actions are not triggered and this race point remains active.

PropertyDef.name: PenaltyHeight
PropertyDef.descr: The height, in meters, above which the player incurs the AbovePenalty.

PropertyDef.name: AbovePenalty
PropertyDef.descr: The time penalty in seconds to be added if the player flies above the PenaltyHeight.

PropertyDef.name: InsidePenalty
PropertyDef.descr: The time penalty in seconds to be added if the player passes to the inside of the pylon.

PropertyDef.name: ConditionPenalty
PropertyDef.descr: If this is greater than zero, it is the time penalty for failing to meet the OnEnterCondition.

PropertyDef.name: PenaltyWidth
PropertyDef.descr: Passing the gate between this width, in meters, and the width of the gate, incurs this penalty in seconds.

PropertyDef.name: OutsidePenalty
PropertyDef.descr: The time penalty in seconds for flying outside the PenaltyWidth.

PropertyDef.name: ClipGatePenalty
PropertyDef.descr: Clipping the gate costs you this many seconds.

PropertyDef.name: CountdownSeconds
PropertyDef.descr: A number in seconds that the system is in a Paused state before the players can start flying, enabling the players to get ready.

PropertyDef.name: FinishWaitTime
PropertyDef.descr: Races end when one of the following applies: All players have passed the final race point, sufficient time has elapsed after the first racer finishers (this time is the addition of the penalty time for the first place finisher added to the FinishWaitTime, the idea is to give all the other players a reasonable chance to finish, especially in the case where the first finisher has penalty time and subsequent finishers might actually win the race if they finish later but with fewer penalties, or lastly when a race ends the results are displayed to all the participants.

PropertyDef.name: SavedRaceTime
PropertyDef.descr: Saved single player race current racetime.

PropertyDef.name: IsDisqualified
PropertyDef.descr: Is the racer disqualified?

PropertyDef.name: PenaltyTime
PropertyDef.descr: Amount of time penalized.

PropertyDef.name: RacePointIndex
PropertyDef.descr: Current racepoint index.

PropertyDef.name: NumLaps
PropertyDef.descr: The number of laps in the race.

PropertyDef.name: LapDistance
PropertyDef.descr: Length of one lap (in miles).

PropertyDef.name: ClockStart
PropertyDef.descr: One of: OnAction, OnFirstRacePoint, Immediate. If this is set to Immediate, the race course clock will start when the CountdownSeconds have completed. If this is set to OnFirstRacePoint, the clock will start when the first aircraft passes the first race point. If this is set to OnAction, the race clock will not start until the RaceClockStartAction occurs.

PropertyDef.name: Place
PropertyDef.descr: If this is set to 0, the trigger will fire when the local user crosses the finish line, typically the last gate of the last lap, in a race. This will not necessarily be when the race is over. If this is set to a non-zero integer, the trigger will fire only when the race is completely finished and the local user has finished in the place specified. This second option allows for the granting of rewards when the user finishes, for example, in 1st, 2nd, or 3rd place.

PropertyDef.name: RaceCourseActive
PropertyDef.descr: Set to True if the race course is to be active as soon as the CountdownSeconds have completed. Set to False if a RaceCourseActivationAction is to be used to activate the race course. If the race course is not active, flying through the gates will not fire any actions.

PropertyDef.name: TrackRaceLeader
PropertyDef.descr: Camera will track the current race leader rather than a set object.

PropertyDef.name: DisplayRaceMap
PropertyDef.descr: Set to True if all players are to see a race map.

PropertyDef.name: RaceMapZoomLevel
PropertyDef.descr: The zoom level of the map, from 0 to 23. 23 is maximum zoom.

PropertyDef.name: Maneuver
PropertyDef.descr: Maneuver icon to display, refer to the List of Maneuvers. The default is None.

PropertyDef.name: PlaybackMode
PropertyDef.descr: Determine how the flight segment is played back.

PropertyDef.name: Optional
PropertyDef.descr: If value is set to True, then failing a goal will not fail scenario.

PropertyDef.name: PointValue
PropertyDef.descr: Point value of a goal used in scoring missions.

PropertyDef.name: PropertyName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of a property.

PropertyDef.name: PropertyValue
PropertyDef.descr: Value of a property.

PropertyDef.name: EntityID
PropertyDef.descr: Reference to an observable SimObject.

PropertyDef.name: PostProcess
PropertyDef.descr: Post process to apply to camera.

PropertyDef.name: RenderToTexture
PropertyDef.descr: Set to True if this camera is a Render To Texture view.

PropertyDef.name: PictureInPicture
PropertyDef.descr: Set to True if this camera will open in a view.

PropertyDef.name: SecondaryName
PropertyDef.descr: Secondary property name.

PropertyDef.name: AreaRadius
PropertyDef.descr: Default units are in meters.

PropertyDef.name: RenderInMission
PropertyDef.descr: Set to True if the Area Definition or Flight Segment should render in the scenario.

PropertyDef.name: HighFrequency
PropertyDef.descr: Set to True if the object should simulate at a higher frequency (100 ms)

PropertyDef.name: AlwaysShowCorrectAnswers
PropertyDef.descr: Set to True if the Multiple Choice Popup should show the correct answers when an incorrect answer is submitted.

PropertyDef.name: AlwaysDisplayResult
PropertyDef.descr: Set to True if the Multiple Choice Popup should display whether or not the user is correct when the answer is submitted.

PropertyDef.name: TriggeringParameter
PropertyDef.descr: Parameter used to start the segment when the user reaches the first measured value of the parameter in the recording.

PropertyDef.name: Tolerance
PropertyDef.descr: Percentage difference from the measured value that will be considered equivalent to the measured value and thus start the segment.

PropertyDef.name: RecordingFilename
PropertyDef.descr: Filename of the Flight Recording

PropertyDef.name: UseFileTimeFrom
PropertyDef.descr: Time relative to the start of the recording that will be used as the start time for the recording.

PropertyDef.name: UseFileTimeTo
PropertyDef.descr: Time relative to the start of the recording that will be used as the end time for the recording.

PropertyDef.name: CurrentFileTime
PropertyDef.descr: Current Time relative to the start of the recording that the flight segment has progressed to.

PropertyDef.name: SegmentFinished
PropertyDef.descr: Whether the flight segment has finished grading.

PropertyDef.name: PreviewSegment
PropertyDef.descr: Set to prevent flight segment from double loading when previewing in SimDirector.

PropertyDef.name: StartConditionMet
PropertyDef.descr: Whether the start condition has been met for this flight segment.

PropertyDef.name: FileTime
PropertyDef.descr: Time relative to the start of the recording that when reached during the segment, will fire this action.

PropertyDef.name: Parameter
PropertyDef.descr: Parameter to use as the basis for this RangeParameter.

PropertyDef.name: RangeName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the range.

PropertyDef.name: MaxOverMeasured
PropertyDef.descr: Upper bound of the range relative to the measured value.

PropertyDef.name: MinUnderMeasured
PropertyDef.descr: Lower bound of the range relative to the measured value.

PropertyDef.name: RangeExceededCount
PropertyDef.descr: Number of times this range was exceeded in a particular segment grading session.

PropertyDef.name: PauseOnShow
PropertyDef.descr: Pauses the simulation when the prompt is shown and unpauses when it is closed.

PropertyDef.name: GaugeVariableName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the gauge variable to set.

PropertyDef.name: GaugeVariableFriendlyName
PropertyDef.descr: Human readable version of gauge variable name.

PropertyDef.name: GaugeVariableValue
PropertyDef.descr: Value to set the gauge variable to.

PropertyDef.name: GaugeVariableUnits
PropertyDef.descr: Units to set the gauge variable to.

PropertyDef.name: RecordingBookmark
PropertyDef.descr: Creates a bookmark in flight recording when True

PropertyDef.name: CheckpointCreated
PropertyDef.descr: Used to signify if this action has created the checkpoint. This prevents a resave when resuming execution.

PropertyDef.name: IsExecuting
PropertyDef.descr: True if VI session action is currently executing. Do not set.

PropertyDef.name: VariableValue
PropertyDef.descr: Starting value of scenario variable.

PropertyDef.name: VariableType
PropertyDef.descr: Data type of the variable.

PropertyDef.name: BindingMode
PropertyDef.descr: Binding mode defining variable's relationship to its referenced object property.

PropertyDef.name: PropertyReference
PropertyDef.descr: Property identifier or path identifier (path to property)

PropertyDef.name: PropertyIndex
PropertyDef.descr: Property index or path index (path to property)

PropertyDef.name: PromptUser
PropertyDef.descr: Whether or not to prompt the user for a file name when the recorder is stopped.

PropertyDef.name: RecordingTitle
PropertyDef.descr: Title for the recording

PropertyDef.name: RecordingDescription
PropertyDef.descr: Description for the recording

PropertyDef.name: FaceCameraXAxis
PropertyDef.descr: Should the specified object face the camera's X-Axis?

PropertyDef.name: FaceCameraYAxis
PropertyDef.descr: Should the specified object face the camera's Y-Axis?

PropertyDef.name: FaceCameraZAxis
PropertyDef.descr: Should the specified object face the camera's Z-Axis?

PropertyDef.name: Fidelity
PropertyDef.descr: Distance between each object or line segment along the visual path

PropertyDef.name: RibbonWidth
PropertyDef.descr: Width of the ribbon

PropertyDef.name: RibbonHeight
PropertyDef.descr: Height of the ribbon

PropertyDef.name: LoadObjectFile
PropertyDef.descr: Whether the scenario should load the objects in its object file.

PropertyDef.name: ScenarioFileName
PropertyDef.descr: Filename of the scenario file to load

PropertyDef.name: ZOrder
PropertyDef.descr: Determines the order of how the panel window should appear. 0 is the bottom. 100 is the top. If set to -1, the default for the panel will be used.

PropertyDef.name: OriginX
PropertyDef.descr: Determines the x origin of rotation for the ScaleformObject. -0.5 is left, 0 is center, 0.5 is right.

PropertyDef.name: OriginY
PropertyDef.descr: Determines the y origin of rotation for the ScaleformObject. -0.5 is bottom, 0 is center, 0.5 is top.

PropertyDef.name: SavedWindowID
PropertyDef.descr: Window ID in scenario file of Window scenario object.

PropertyDef.name: WindowTitle
PropertyDef.descr: Title of window.

PropertyDef.name: UseBodyRelativeTracking
PropertyDef.descr: If turned on, the camera will rotate with the object it is attached to while tracking. Otherwise it will rotate in world coordinates to track the target.

PropertyDef.name: ChangePosition
PropertyDef.descr: Whether to update to position of the destination object with the source object's position.

PropertyDef.name: ChangeOrientation
PropertyDef.descr: Whether to update to orientation of the destination object with the source object's orientation.

PropertyDef.name: AddCurrentOffset
PropertyDef.descr: If turned on, the destination object's current offset from the object it is being attached to will be added to the specified offset.

PropertyDef.name: UseCurrentOrientation
PropertyDef.descr: If turned on, the destination object's current orientation will be preserved.

SetDef.name: OnEnterFilter
SetDef.descr: List of objects that will fire the OnEnterActions on entering the box, if the OnEnterCondition is met.

SetDef.name: OnExitFilter
SetDef.descr: List of objects that will fire the OnExitActions on leaving the box, if the OnExitConditions are met.

SetDef.name: DisabledTrafficAirports
SetDef.descr: A disabled airport will not be involved in any AI traffic, either as a starting point or a destination.

SetDef.name: OnEnterActions
SetDef.descr: Actions that execute when you enter the trigger.

SetDef.name: OnExitActions
SetDef.descr: Actions that execute when you exit the trigger.

SetDef.name: Actions
SetDef.descr: Actions that execute when the trigger is tripped.

SetDef.name: SessionActions
SetDef.descr: Actions which comprise a recorded session.

SetDef.name: RepeatActions
SetDef.descr: Actions that need to execute across multiple frames (read only).

SetDef.name: Triggers
SetDef.descr: List triggers to be acted upon.

SetDef.name: Areas
SetDef.descr: A list of AreaDefinition objects, defining the volume.

SetDef.name: DialogActionQueue
SetDef.descr: Queue of dialog actions.

SetDef.name: QueuedRewards
SetDef.descr: Bag of rewards received.

SetDef.name: MissionGlobalState
SetDef.descr: Global state of the mission saved.

SetDef.name: ProximityTrigger
SetDef.descr: A proximity trigger is fired when the specified object, usually the users aircraft, enters a given box.

SetDef.name: TimerTrigger
SetDef.descr: A timer trigger fires when the given number of seconds has elapsed.

SetDef.name: LivingWorldExclusion
SetDef.descr: A living world exclusion object is used to exclude one or more types of living world objects from a mission.

SetDef.name: TimerAdjustAction
SetDef.descr: The timer adjust action adds the DeltaTime property value to the timer trigger's internal clock.

SetDef.name: ResetTimerAction
SetDef.descr: The reset timer action is used to set the current time of a list of timers back to their start times.

SetDef.name: OneShotSoundAction
SetDef.descr: The one shot sound action will render a single wave file. Use this for sound effects rather than dialog (use the Dialog action for speech audio).

SetDef.name: PlayListItem
SetDef.descr: A playlist item is an audio track that forms part of a playlist action.

SetDef.name: PlayListAction
SetDef.descr: The play list action will play the specified music items on the adventure music track. Individual play list items can be set to a random position within the play list.

SetDef.name: DialogAction
SetDef.descr: A dialog action is used to add speech to be rendered over the audio system, and/or text to be displayed on the screen.

SetDef.name: ObjectActivationAction
SetDef.descr: The object activation action will change the state of most different types of object, Triggers, AI objects, Scenery objects and some Mission objects. Do not use it for points of interest, use PointOfInterestActivationAction for that particular case.

SetDef.name: MultiChoicePopupActionCorrectAnswerActions
SetDef.descr: Actions that execute when the question is answered correctly.

SetDef.name: MultiChoicePopupActionIncorrectAnswerActions
SetDef.descr: Actions that execute when the question is answered incorrectly.

SetDef.name: MultiChoicePopupAction
SetDef.descr: Prompts the user to answer a multiple-choice question.

SetDef.name: CameraInterpolation
SetDef.descr: Changes the position, direction, and orientation of the camera.

SetDef.name: CameraPreview
SetDef.descr: Preview the camera that will be changed to.

SetDef.name: ViewChangeAction
SetDef.descr: Change the current camera with an option to use interpolation.

SetDef.name: UserInputActivationAction
SetDef.descr: Provides the ability to disable or re-enable the user from processing input events.

SetDef.name: FocalPoint
SetDef.descr: An object that allows and shows highlights and text descriptions of a defined region.

SetDef.name: FocalPointCoordinates
SetDef.descr: Focal Point Highlight read-only information. Coordinates used for Virtual Cockpit drawing.

SetDef.name: FocalPointPanelCoordinates
SetDef.descr: Focal Point Highlight read-only information. Coordinates used for 2D panel drawing.

SetDef.name: SimulateMouseEventAction
SetDef.descr: Simulates mouse event at given point.

SetDef.name: DelayAction
SetDef.descr: Adds a delay before firing a set of actions.

SetDef.name: VirtualInstructorSessionAction
SetDef.descr: A virtual instructor session recording will execute its recorded session actions sequentially upon being fired.

SetDef.name: SimulateEventAction
SetDef.descr: Simulates a Prepar3D control event.

SetDef.name: SpawnLists
SetDef.descr: A spawn list is a list of objects (AI aircraft, scenery objects, triggers, and actions) that should only appear in the mission when a certain stage in the mission has been reached. Spawn lists are initiated by Spawn actions. If the spawn action is called more than once, then multiple objects are created.

SetDef.name: SpawnAction
SetDef.descr: A spawn action will create all the new objects (including AI aircraft, scenery, actions and triggers) specified in a Spawn List object. A spawn action that is called multiple times will create multiple objects.

SetDef.name: PlayFlightRecordingAction
SetDef.descr: A play flight recording action is used to add a prerecorded flight to a mission, usually a multiplayer racing mission. As the AI pilot in Prepar3D® is geared towards commercial and general aviation traffic, and not racing, an additional method of adding an aircraft to a race course is to record an aircraft (under user control) taking part on the race course, and then replaying that flight file during the actual race. Refer also to the AirplanePlayback property of AI objects.

SetDef.name: AIBehaviorActivationAction
SetDef.descr: Activates or deactivates an AI Behavior for a specified AI Object.

SetDef.name: SetTargetAction
SetDef.descr: Sets the target of an AI by GUID or Location

SetDef.name: SetPauseAction
SetDef.descr: Pauses or unpauses the user, all objects, or the flight.

SetDef.name: TargetReference
SetDef.descr: A reference to either a Guid of an object or an LLA

SetDef.name: AreaLandingTrigger
SetDef.descr: An area landing trigger is fired when the user's aircraft (not AI controlled aircraft) lands on one in a specified list of areas.

SetDef.name: AirportLandingTrigger
SetDef.descr: An airport landing trigger is fired when the user's aircraft (not AI controlled aircraft) lands on a runway.

SetDef.name: CollisionTrigger
SetDef.descr: A collision trigger is fired when an object, typically the user aircraft, hits an object such as a gate or pylon. When an object has an associated collision trigger the default crash behavior is overridden, and the actions initiated by this trigger specify the collision effects. For example, if gates and pylons have collision triggers they might initiate a PlayAnimationAction to render the deflating pylon collapsing. Other appropriate actions might be the DisqualifyPlayerAction or the TimePenaltyAction.

SetDef.name: CollisionEntityReferences
SetDef.descr: A list of entities for which the CollisionTrigger should detect collisions between the list of entities and the objects in the ObjectReferenceList

SetDef.name: RunwayFilter
SetDef.descr: A runway filter object can be used to specify exactly which runway an aircraft is to land on.

SetDef.name: AttachedWorldPosition
SetDef.descr: Attached world positions define a world position and whether or not that position is described as above ground level or sea level.

SetDef.name: AttachedWorldObject
SetDef.descr: Attached world objects define a reference to the object it should attach to as well as an offset and settings that determine how the attached to object's orientation should affect the object.

SetDef.name: RectangleArea
SetDef.descr: RectangleArea defines a 3D box. The edges of the box will not appear when the mission is being played.

SetDef.name: TriggerValue
SetDef.descr: Value which will trigger actions to fire.

SetDef.name: Formula
SetDef.descr: Expression to evaluate to a resultant value.

SetDef.name: Condition
SetDef.descr: Clicking on this will load up the Conditional Editor, to apply conditions to the activation of this mission object.

SetDef.name: PropertyTrigger
SetDef.descr: A property trigger fires when one or more conditions are met. These conditions can be based on aircraft speed, altitude, failure of components, or a whole host of other simulation variables.

SetDef.name: FailureAction
SetDef.descr: A failure action is used to change the behavior of one of the simobject's systems. It is possible also to change a failing system's status back to fully functional, by changing its HealthPercent value to 100. Failures only apply to the user aircraft, unless the TargetPlayer property specifies otherwise.

SetDef.name: RandomAction
SetDef.descr: The random action is used to initiate one action from a list of possibilities.

SetDef.name: AdjustPayloadAction
SetDef.descr: An adjust payload action is used to set, or add to, the weight on a payload station.

SetDef.name: ChangeObjectTypeAction
SetDef.descr: A change object type action changes the object the user is in. For example, it can be used to change from one type of aircraft to another.

SetDef.name: CounterTrigger
SetDef.descr: A counter trigger will fire when it is counter reaches a specified limit. The counter is incremented by Count Actions.

SetDef.name: CountAction
SetDef.descr: A count action will add the value of the Count property to the Counter value in the given list of triggers (which should all be Counter triggers). Counter triggers will fire when a certain specified count is reached.

SetDef.name: PointOfInterest
SetDef.descr: Use the point of interest object to highlight a location or other object. The highlight can be, for example, a vertical beam of light pointing at the object. Points of interest are displayed in the mission compass, and can be stepped through according to the cycle order.

SetDef.name: PointOfInterestActivationAction
SetDef.descr: A point of interest activation action will change the state of one or more Point of Interest objects. It is very similar to ObjectActivationAction, but also sets the current point of interest to be the one with the lowest cycle order in its list.

SetDef.name: AttachEffectAction
SetDef.descr: The attach effect action attaches a single special effect (such as smoke, fire, contrail etc.) to one or more objects.

SetDef.name: Goals
SetDef.descr: List of Goal Objects to have their resolution changed.

SetDef.name: MissionObjective
SetDef.descr: Mission Objective - References Goals or Group Goals for mission scoring.

SetDef.name: GroupGoal
SetDef.descr: A group goal can be used as part of a objective hierarchy that can be passed or failed via GoalResolutionAction or by accumulating enough points from its collection of referenced goals.

SetDef.name: Goal
SetDef.descr: A goal which can be used as part of a objective hierarchy that can be completed or failed via GoalResolutionAction. NOTE: Completed goals can still be failed unless failure triggers are deactivated.

SetDef.name: GoalResolutionAction
SetDef.descr: The goal resolution action is used to set whether goals have been completed or not. NOTE: Completed goals can still be failed unless failure triggers are deactivated.

SetDef.name: OnScreenText
SetDef.descr: Display floating text at a certain location on screen.

SetDef.name: GrantRewardAction
SetDef.descr: The grant reward action rewards the user with a single reward.

SetDef.name: AttachDroppablePayloadAction
SetDef.descr: An attach droppable payload action is used to change the payload that gets dropped when the user presses a key configured to drop the payload.

SetDef.name: ParkingTrigger
SetDef.descr: A parking trigger will fire when the user has reached the parking spot assigned by the ATC at the airport specified. When allocating a parking space to an aircraft, a radius based on half the wingspan defined in the [aircraft_geometry] section of the Aircraft Configuration File is used.

SetDef.name: RealismOverrides
SetDef.descr: This object can be used to override the user's realism settings. For the specific properties: UserSpecified indicates that the user's settings should be used.

SetDef.name: Camera
SetDef.descr: Use the camera mission object to place a camera in the world, which can be at a fixed location or attached to another (moving) object. The view from the camera will become the main view for the user.

SetDef.name: PictureInPictureViewController
SetDef.descr: A PictureInPictureViewController object adds a small view window and is typically used for a 'bomb-cam' - giving a view of or from a falling object.

SetDef.name: PlayAnimationAction
SetDef.descr: The play animation action will initiate an animation sequence on one or more objects.

SetDef.name: RumbleAction
SetDef.descr: The rumble action is used to initiate rumble in the Universal Controller (typically an XBox controller).

SetDef.name: MenuItem
SetDef.descr: Menu item objects form the options for a Menu Prompt trigger.

SetDef.name: MenuPromptTrigger
SetDef.descr: A menu prompt trigger will create a menu of options for the user. For some missions this can be as simple as the option to continue, and the option to turn back.

SetDef.name: Thermal
SetDef.descr: A thermal object can be used to simulate atmospheric effects, including thermals and downdrafts.

SetDef.name: AirObjectVisual
SetDef.descr: Describes an air object visualisation.

SetDef.name: AirObjectVisuals
SetDef.descr: List of effects that can be used to show air masses.

SetDef.name: RidgeLift
SetDef.descr: A RidgeLift object is used to simulate the effect of a hill slope on the wind.

SetDef.name: ThermalDescription
SetDef.descr: Thermal description.

SetDef.name: ThermalDescriptions
SetDef.descr: List of thermal descriptions for each land class.

SetDef.name: SetWeatherStationAction
SetDef.descr: SetWeatherStationAction is used to set the weather at a specific weather station, identified from within the Metar data. The specified weather station to be set will be cleared before applying the new Metar Data.

SetDef.name: ClearWeatherStationAction
SetDef.descr: ClearWeatherStationAction is used to remove a specific weather station via a station ID or all weather stations, by default.

SetDef.name: CustomAction
SetDef.descr: A custom action is used to enable communications between a mission and a SimConnect client application.

SetDef.name: RefillAction
SetDef.descr: A refill action is used to refuel aircraft with one or more types of fuel. Refer to the Aircraft Configuration Files document for more information on Nitrous and AntiDetonation fuel types.

SetDef.name: OnPenaltyActions
SetDef.descr: The actions initiated if penalties are incurred when negotiating the gate.

SetDef.name: ScriptAction
SetDef.descr: Action that executes a given piece of script

SetDef.name: ScriptTrigger
SetDef.descr: Fires when script evaluates to a non-zero number

SetDef.name: CreateCheckpointAction
SetDef.descr: Action that creates a checkpoint of current mission progress

SetDef.name: Checkpoint
SetDef.descr: Indexed mission checkpoint

SetDef.name: CheckpointSet
SetDef.descr: Group of indexed mission checkpoints

SetDef.name: RibbonPath
SetDef.descr: Trailing ribbon displayed behind object using VisualPath.

SetDef.name: ObjectPath
SetDef.descr: Library object used to visualize path.

SetDef.name: VisualPath
SetDef.descr: Visualization of a dynamic path that trails behind an object or a static path from a fixed path such as a WaypointList.

SetDef.name: ScaleformPanel
SetDef.descr: Representation of a panel which can reference arbitrary Scaleform content. Can be opened (or moved) using an OpenPanelAction or closed using a ClosePanelAction.

SetDef.name: Panel
SetDef.descr: Representation of an instrument panel. Can be opened (or moved) using an OpenPanelAction or closed using a ClosePanelAction.

SetDef.name: OpenPanelAction
SetDef.descr: Used to open a panel at a specified position and size.

SetDef.name: OpenWindowAction
SetDef.descr: Used to open a window at a specified position and size.

SetDef.name: ChangeColorAction
SetDef.descr: Used to change the color of an object.

SetDef.name: RelativeLocation
SetDef.descr: Location relative to monitor or main Prepar3D window if docked.

SetDef.name: RelativeExpansionSize
SetDef.descr: Size to add to base width/height relative to monitor or main Prepar3D window if docked.

SetDef.name: SetWindowLocation
SetDef.descr: If added, sets location of the window based on the properties within.

SetDef.name: SetWindowSize
SetDef.descr: If added, sets size of the window based on the properties within.

SetDef.name: ClosePanelAction
SetDef.descr: Used to close a panel.

SetDef.name: CloseWindowAction
SetDef.descr: Used to close a window.

SetDef.name: ViewWindow
SetDef.descr: Representation of a 3D window. Can be opened (or moved) using an OpenWindowAction or closed using a CloseWindowAction. View can be changed using a ViewChangeAction.

SetDef.name: PanelWindow
SetDef.descr: Representation of an instrument panel. Can be opened (or moved) using an OpenWindowAction or closed using a CloseWindowAction.

SetDef.name: ScaleformPanelWindow
SetDef.descr: Representation of a panel which can reference arbitrary Scaleform content. Can be opened (or moved) using an OpenWindowAction or closed using a CloseWindowAction.

SetDef.name: Player
SetDef.descr: Player objects are used to identify the participants in a multiplayer mission, whether it be a race or other type of mission such as search-and-rescue etc.

SetDef.name: RacerData
SetDef.descr: Reference to the RaceCourse mission object.

SetDef.name: RacePointResult
SetDef.descr: Result time for passing a racepoint.

SetDef.name: RaceCourse
SetDef.descr: An ordered list of Race Waypoints defining the course.

SetDef.name: RaceInfo
SetDef.descr: General information about the race.

SetDef.name: AllowableContainerList
SetDef.descr: An allowable container list is used to specify a list of container titles. This is currently only used by the Player object to specify a range of aircraft that the user must select one from.

SetDef.name: AllowableContainersReference
SetDef.descr: Reference to an optional AllowableContainerList object, typically specifying the range of aircraft types that the user must select one from.

SetDef.name: PylonRacePoint
SetDef.descr: A pylon race point object adds a single pylon to a race course. There is no specific graphic associated with a pylon. The graphics are a library object positioned appropriately (refer also to the notes for the Collision trigger).

SetDef.name: GateRacePoint
SetDef.descr: A gate race point object adds a gate to a race course. A gate is typically two vertical pylons, though there is no specific graphic associated with a gate. The graphics are library objects positioned appropriately (refer also to the notes for the Collision trigger).

SetDef.name: VolumeRacePoint
SetDef.descr: A volume race point specifies one or more areas that are to be entered as part of a race.

SetDef.name: ConditionRacePoint
SetDef.descr: A condition race point triggers its actions when the OnEnterCondition is met. A complex maneuver, such as a vertical 360 requires several condition race points, each testing that the aircraft is vertical and has rotated through a certain number of degrees (say around 90). Each of these condition race points should present the same Maneuver icon (the Vertical360 in this case), and the OnEnterActions of such a complex maneuver should simply be to activate the next condition race point in the sequence.

SetDef.name: RaceClockStartAction
SetDef.descr: A race clock start action can be used to start the race clock This action is only necessary if the ClockStart property of a Race Info object is set to OnAction.

SetDef.name: RaceCourseActivateAction
SetDef.descr: A race course activate action can be used to activate the course. This action will typically be called from a Timer trigger, though could be called for example from a Proximity trigger - say requiring participants to do a warm-up lap of the course. This action will set the RaceCourseActive property of a Race Info object to True, and is only necessary if this property is currently False.

SetDef.name: TimePenaltyAction
SetDef.descr: A time penalty action is used to add a number of seconds to a player's race time. Note that this number can be negative, so adding a bonus rather than a penalty to the player.

SetDef.name: DisqualifyPlayerAction
SetDef.descr: A disqualify player action is used to disqualify and remove usually one player from a race.

SetDef.name: RaceEndTrigger
SetDef.descr: A race end trigger is fired either when the user crosses the finish line, or when the user has finished in a specified place.

SetDef.name: LastLapTrigger
SetDef.descr: A last lap trigger fires when the local user starts the last lap of the race.

SetDef.name: ChangeObjectPlacementAction
SetDef.descr: Sets the position and orientation of the destination object to the source object.

SetDef.name: ChangeObjectAttachmentAction
SetDef.descr: Attaches or detaches an object from another object. Attaches if an AttachedWorldObject is added, detaches otherwise.

SetDef.name: SetPropertyAction
SetDef.descr: Sets the specified simulation property to the specified value.

SetDef.name: CylinderPosition
SetDef.descr: List of positions for each joint of the CylinderPathArea.

SetDef.name: FlightSegment
SetDef.descr: Links to a flight recording and is used to test and grade against the flight recording by comparing the user's measured parameters to the recorded parameters.

SetDef.name: SegmentGoal
SetDef.descr: Goal which will be passed upon completion of this segment or failed upon failure of this segment.

SetDef.name: StartSegmentActions
SetDef.descr: Actions to fire when this segment is started.

SetDef.name: FinishSegmentActions
SetDef.descr: Actions to fire when this segment is finished.

SetDef.name: StartSegmentCondition
SetDef.descr: Condition to wait for the user to reach before starting the segment.

SetDef.name: SequencedAction
SetDef.descr: Action to fire during the flight segment and when to fire it.

SetDef.name: RangeParameter
SetDef.descr: Parameter and the ranges used to define different levels of proficiency of staying near the measured values of the parameter.

SetDef.name: Range
SetDef.descr: A range assigned to this parameter which determines when the user goes outside of the range and keeps track of how many times they've left the range.

SetDef.name: OverRangeActions
SetDef.descr: Actions to fire when the user goes over this range.

SetDef.name: UnderRangeActions
SetDef.descr: Actions to fire when the user falls under this range.

SetDef.name: SetGaugeVariableAction
SetDef.descr: Actions to fire when the user falls under this range.

SetDef.name: TriggerCondition
SetDef.descr: A set containing a TriggerValue that can fire specified actions when it equals the VariableValue.

SetDef.name: ScenarioVariable
SetDef.descr: Scenario Variable can be used to store values, retrieve values, and listen for value changes on a scenario variable of the specified name and instance.

SetDef.name: BindingContext
SetDef.descr: Object whose property is bound to the variable.

SetDef.name: BindingProperty
SetDef.descr: Property that is bound to the variable.

SetDef.name: Function
SetDef.descr: Uses an expression tree to compute a resultant value.

SetDef.name: SetScenarioVariableAction
SetDef.descr: Sets a scenario variable's value to the output of a function.

SetDef.name: SourceReference
SetDef.descr: Reference whose output will be used to update the destination reference.

SetDef.name: DestinationReference
SetDef.descr: Reference whose output will be updated to the source reference.

SetDef.name: MaterialOptions
SetDef.descr: This set allows for customization of advanced material options

SetDef.name: ScaleformObject
SetDef.descr: A 3D object which can reference arbitrary scaleform content.

SetDef.name: LoadScenarioAction
SetDef.descr: The load scenario action will load the specified scenario, effectively ending the current scenario.

SetDef.name: CameraReference
SetDef.descr: Camera object to use instead of camera definition to apply to window.

SetDef.name: WindowReference
SetDef.descr: Window object to use instead of the main window to apply change to.

SetDef.name: RecordStartAction
SetDef.descr: The record start action will initiate the recording of the flight.

SetDef.name: RecordStopAction
SetDef.descr: The record stop action ends the recording of the flight, optionally prompting for a file name
